mdx.rawBody:
WIP DOCUMENT

The First Version of Webizen by Web Civics ([[Webizen V3.0]]) will most likely be produced using Go and the focus will be on deploying a particular type of topology based upon [[Semantic Web]] technologies.

- [[Temporal Semantics]] 
- [[Permissive Commons]]
